stimulusHtml: Johnny often hits his brother even though his brother does not do anything to antagonize him. Johnnyâ€™s aggression is most likely due to a combination of which of the following factors?
choicesHtml: his genetic makeup, the fact that aggression can be evolutionarily adaptive, and a lack of neuroplasticity
the environment he grew up in, developmental delays, and the fact that aggression can be evolutionarily adaptive
his genetic makeup, developmental delays, and a lack of neuroplasticity
his genetic makeup, the environment he grew up in, and the fact that aggression can be evolutionarily adaptive
